analyzed: su alpa akṣarā prajñāpāramitā
namaḥ sarva buddha bodhisattvebhyaḥ
evam mayā śrutam

original: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ dvādaśasāhasrapañcaśatairbodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ viharati sma,
analyzed: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣu saṃghena sārdham dvādaśa sāhasra pañcaśataiḥ bodhisattva koṭi niyuta śata sahasraiḥ sārdham viharati sma

original: lokapālādidevakoṭiniyutasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ śrīsiṃhāsane viharati sma ||
analyzed: lokapāla ādi deva koṭi niyuta sahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ śrī siṃhāsane viharati sma

original: atha khalu bodhisattvo mahāsattvo āryāvalokiteśvaro utthāya āsanādekamaṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya prahasitavadano bhūtvā bhagavantametadavocat-deśayatu bhagavān prajñāpāramitāṃ svalpākṣarāṃ mahāpuṇyām,
analyzed: atha khalu bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ utthāya āsanāt ekam aṃsam uttarāsaṅgam kṛtvā dakṣiṇam jānu maṇḍalam pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavān tena añjalim praṇamya prahasita vadanaḥ bhūtvā bhagavantam etat avocat deśayatu bhagavān prajñāpāramitām su alpa akṣarām mahā puṇyām
yasyāḥ śravaṇa mātreṇa sarva sattvāḥ sarva karma āvaraṇāni kṣapayiṣyanti
niyatam ca bodhi parāyaṇāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ye ca sattvā mantrasādhane udyuktāsteṣāṃ cāvighnena mantrāḥ sidhyanti ||
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ mantra sādhane udyuktāḥ teṣām ca avighnena mantrāḥ sidhyanti

original: atha khalu bhagavān āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākaruṇikāya sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān ārya avalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahā karuṇikāya sādhukāram adāt sādhu sādhu kula putra

original: yastvaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya pradhānāya ca dīrgharātraṃ niyuktaḥ |
analyzed: yaḥ tvam sarva sattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya pradhānāya ca dīrgharātram niyuktaḥ
tena hi tvam kula putra śṛṇu

original: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru |
analyzed: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru
bhāṣiṣye iham te prajñāpāramitām su alpa akṣarām mahā puṇyām
yasyāḥ śravaṇa mātreṇa sarva sattvāḥ sarva karma āvaraṇāni kṣapayiṣyanti
niyatam ca bodhi parāyaṇāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ye ca sattvā mantrasādhane udyuktāsteṣāṃ cāvighnenaḥ mantrāḥ sidhyanti ||
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ mantra sādhane udyuktāḥ teṣām ca avighnena mantrāḥ sidhyanti

original: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-tena hi sugata bhāṣatu sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya ca ||
analyzed: atha khalu ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat tena hi sugata bhāṣatu sarva sattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya ca

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ sarvaduḥkhapramocano nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma,
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām sarvaduḥkhapramocanaḥ nāma samādhim samāpadyate sma

original: yasya ca samādhiṃ samāpannasya bhagavata ūrṇākośavivarāllavādanekāni raśmikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma |
analyzed: yasya ca samādhim samāpannasya bhagavataḥ ūrṇā kośa vivarāt lavāt anekāni raśmi koṭi niyuta śata sahasrāṇi niścaranti sma
taiḥ ca raśmibhiḥ sarva buddhakṣetrāṇi parisphuṭāni abhūvan
ye ca sattvāḥ tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭāḥ
te sarve niyatāḥ abhūvan anuttarāya samyaksaṃbodhau

original: yāvannārakāḥ sattvāḥ * * * sarve ca buddhakṣetrāṇi ṣaḍvikāraṃ praviceluḥ |
analyzed: yāvat nārakāḥ sattvāḥ    sarve ca buddhakṣetrāṇi ṣaṣ vikāram praviceluḥ
divyāni ca candana cūrṇa varṣāṇi tathāgata pāda mūlam vavarṣuḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate sma |
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām prajñāpāramitām bhāṣate sma
tat yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sama cittena bhavitavyam
sarva sattveṣu maitra cittena bhavitavyam
kṛtajñena bhavitavyam
kṛtavedinā ca bhavitavyam
sarva pāpa virata cittena bhavitavyam
idam ca prajñāpāramitā hṛdayam āgrahītavyam namaḥ ratnatrayāya
namaḥ śākyamunaye tathāgatāya arhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya
tat yathā om mune mune mahā munaye svāhā

original: asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā lābhāt mayā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiranuprāptā |
analyzed: asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ lābhāt mayā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ anuprāptā
sarva buddhāḥ ca atas niryātāḥ

original: mayā api iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrutā mahāśākyamunestathāgatasya sākṣāt |
analyzed: mayā api iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrutā mahā śākyamuneḥ tathāgatasya sākṣāt

original: tena hi tvaṃ sarvabodhisattvānāmagrato buddhatve ca vyākṛtaḥ-bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate'dhvani sa(mantaraśmisamu)
analyzed: tena hi tvam sarva bodhisattvānām agratas buddhatve ca vyākṛtaḥ bhaviṣyasi tvam māṇava anāgata idhvani samanta raśmi samudra

original: dgataḥ śrīkūṭarājā nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
analyzed: dgataḥ śrīkūṭarājā nāma tathāgataḥ ūrhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca buddhaḥ bhagavān
bat iyam api

original: ye idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhayayiṣyanti,
analyzed: ye idam nāmadheyam śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhayayiṣyanti
parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti
pustaka likhitam api kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti

original: te sarve alpopāyena alpaśravaṇena ca tathāgatā bhaviṣyanti |
analyzed: te sarve alpa upāyena alpa śravaṇena ca tathāgatāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: tadyathā-oṃ jeya jeya padmābhe avame avame sarasaraṇi dhiridhiri devatā anupālani yuddhottāriṇi paracakranivāriṇi pūraya pūraya bhagavati sarva āśā mama ca sarvasattvānāṃ ca |
analyzed: tat yathā om jeya jeya padma ābhe avame avame sarasaraṇi dhiridhiri devatāḥ anupālani yuddha uttāriṇi para cakra nivāriṇi pūraya pūraya bhagavati sarve āśāḥ mama ca sarva sattvānām ca
sarva karma āvaraṇāni viśodhaya
buddha adhiṣṭhite svāhā

original: iyaṃ sā kulaputra paramārthaprajñāpāramitā sarvabuddhānāṃ jananī bodhisattvamātā (bodhidātrī)
analyzed: iyam sā kula putra parama artha prajñāpāramitā sarva buddhānām jananī bodhisattva mātā bodhi dātrī
pāpa hārakā

original: sarvabuddhairapi na śaknoti asyānuśaṃsā vaktuṃ yāvatkalpakoṭiśatairapi |
analyzed: sarva buddhaiḥ api na śaknoti asya anuśaṃsā vaktum yāvat kalpa koṭi śataiḥ api
anayā paṭhita mātreṇa sarva parṣad maṇḍala abhiṣiktāḥ bhavanti
sarve ca mantrāḥ abhimukhāḥ bhavanti

original: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat- kena kāraṇena bhagavan iyaṃ svalpākṣarā prajñāpāramitā ?
analyzed: atha ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat kena kāraṇena bhagavan iyam su alpa akṣarā prajñāpāramitā
bhagavān āha alpa upāya tvāt
ye api sattvāḥ manda āsvādāḥ

original: te'pi imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svalpākṣarāṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhayiṣyanti,
analyzed: te api imām prajñāpāramitām su alpa akṣarām dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhayiṣyanti
te sarve alpa upāyena bodhi parāyaṇāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: anena kāraṇena kulaputra iyaṃ saṃkṣiptā svalpākṣarā prajñāpāramitā ||
analyzed: anena kāraṇena kula putra iyam saṃkṣiptā su alpa akṣarā prajñāpāramitā

original: evamukte āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat- āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
analyzed: evam ukte ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat āścaryam bhagavan
parama āścaryam sugata

original: yāvadeva bhagavān sarvasattvahitāya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣito mandapudgalānāmeva arthāya hitāya sukhāya ceti ||
analyzed: yāvat eva bhagavān sarva sattva hitāya ayam dharmaparyāyaḥ bhāṣitaḥ manda pudgalānām eva arthāya hitāya sukhāya ca iti
idam avocat bhagavān
ātta manāḥ ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ

original: te ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti ||
analyzed: te ca bhikṣavaḥ te ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣad sa deva mānuṣa asura gandharvaḥ ca lokaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhyanandan iti
su alpa akṣarā prajñāpāramitā samāptā
